text: Does anyone know if it’s possible to setup a CI/CD for HubSpot CMS using Azure DevOps? I’ve been trying to find info on this but no luck.
It should work about the same as the GitHub action path. I think you’d use Azure Pipelines instead of GitHub actions. The code for the action is open source.
The tl;dr the action installs the HubSpot CLI, and uses the CLI to upload the assets to the HubSpot account you want it to deploy to based on your git branch merging rules.
